title: AyE girdhar
sahitya:
AyE girdhar dvArE mErE gOrI


caraNam 1    amjan adhar lalAT mahAbar nayan unInde cal AyE 
rayan samay prabhu chal bal karikE kaun tiyA ku birmAyE
    caraNam 2    bin guN mAl virAjat hiya mem drDha gal baiyA sukh pAyE 
brajA nArI ku bancan karkE kaisE prItam sukh pAyE
    caraNam 3    sOlA singAr kari phUlan kE hAr liyE vividh sugandh sE man bhAyE
baiThI thI mO man kE sAthI kumud sarOvar kumhAlayE
    caraNam 4    sukh kE kAran dukh kE nivAran madhuvan murali dhun gAyE
padmanAbh prabhu phaNi parashAyI kOTi mAyan tan chavi chAvE
